report_msg: We are sorry for the inconvenience, it seems that there is a problem with our internal server service. Can you tell us how this happened?
placeholder: Please explain your problem or share your thoughts
legal: Some <1>System Information</1> may be sent to SansOrder. We will use the information that give us to help address technical issues and to improve our services.
response_report: Thank you for your report. We will review it as soon as possible.
content_report: Please explain in more detail about the problem in this comment
